name: Lawson HARDRICK, petitioner, v. UNITED STATES.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Lawson HARDRICK, petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES.

opinions.text: Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperisdenied. Petitioner allowed until July 6, 2015, within which to pay the docketing fee required by Rule 38(a) and to submit a petition in compliance with Rule 33.1 of the Rules of this Court.

casebody.head_matter:
Lawson HARDRICK, petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES.
No. 14-9799.
Supreme Court of the United States
June 15, 2015.
Opinion
